oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Performance and discussion - Salute to pedal steel guitarist Buddy Emmons - 2013-09-21
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performances and discussion on the Big E; Salute to pedal steel guitarist Buddy Emmons from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on September 21, 2013. Presented in Partnership with the Americana Music Association in celebration of the album release The Big E: Salute to Steel Guitarist Buddy Emmons.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Duane Eddy; Dan Dugmore; Hargus "Pig" Robbins; Dean Miller; Buck Reid; Tommy White; Steve Fishell; Buddy Emmons;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Program hosted by Bill Lloyd. Participants include Duane Eddy; Dan Dugmore; Hargus "Pig" Robbins; Dean Miller; Buck Reid; Tommy White; Steve Fishell; Buddy Emmons. Includes audio from video. Performances include; Night Life (Band) -- Demonstration of split pedal innovation and diatonic strings (Steve Fishell and Buck Reid) -- Half A Mind (Dean Miller with Buck Reid) -- Blue Jade (Duane Eddy and Dan Dugmore) -- Interview with Buddy Emmons -- Mansion On The Hill (Band).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Emmons, Buddy; Eddy, Duane; Dugmore, Dan; Robbins, Hargus "Pig"; Miller, Dean; Reid, Buck; White, Tommy; Fishell, Steve;
